documentation.description: Returns information about one or more indices.

local.description: Return local information, do not retrieve the state from master node (default: false)

allow_no_indices.description: Ignore if a wildcard expression resolves to no concrete indices (default: false)

expand_wildcards.description: Whether to expand wildcard expression to concrete indices that are open, closed or both.

flat_settings.description: Return settings in flat format (default: false)

include_defaults.description: Whether to return all default setting for each of the indices.

master_timeout.description: Operation timeout for connection to master node

deprecated.description: To promote inclusive language, use 'cluster_manager_timeout' instead.

cluster_manager_timeout.description: Operation timeout for connection to cluster-manager node
